        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Design your Own Picture</string>
            <string language="es">Diseña tu propia imagen</string>
            <string language="ga">Dear do Phictiúr Féin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzipieren Sie Ihre eigene Abbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Concevez votre propre image</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projete seu próprio retrato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetti la vostra propria immagine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιάστε την εικόνα σας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Project instructions where students design a picture out of pexspex.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones de proyecto donde los estudiantes diseñan una imagen de plexiglás.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha tionscadail ina ndearann daltaí pictiúr as peirspéacs.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Metalwork</string>
            <string language="es">Trabajo con metales. Proyecto</string>
            <string language="ga">Miotalóireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Project</string>
            <string language="ga">Tionscadal</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projizieren Sie Anweisungen, in denen 
Kursteilnehmer eine Abbildung aus pexspex heraus konzipieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projetez les instructions où les étudiants 
conçoivent une image hors du pexspex.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projete as instruções onde os estudantes 
projetam um retrato fora do pexspex.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proietti le istruzioni dove gli allievi 
progettano un'immagine da pexspex.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες προγράμματος όπου οι σπουδαστές σχεδιάζουν 
μια εικόνα από το pexspex.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metalwork</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
